summary: Broker/Owner, experienced as being one of the top brokers in the Phoenix area since 1991.  Active in several charity organizations to give back to the community.Have successfully represented thousands of families with their real estate needs since 1986.  Currently have eleven active licensed agents who assist my business and always looking to add a few more quality agents who give 100% when it comes to customer service and results.Specialties: Building a personal residential rental port folio, representing clients in their purchase or sale of primary or investment homes, handling all aspects associated with corporate relocation to and from the Phoenix-Metro area and surrounding cities.
